thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1735
thread.title: Tarek Hejazi

author: Tarek Hejazi
title: Tarek Hejazi
text: I booked through flighthub website and they charged me for seat selection later on I found the airline not charged them for the seats and they took the extra money for them as service charge. Now I paid for them more than what I should pay for the airline direct. Better book through airlines website. Their shown prices not real.They have a lot of hidden charges. Just be careful!
